dataset: IMF Data - SDMX API (multiple databases: IFS, WEO, DOTS, etc.)

sovereign risk context, growth/inflation/debt, sector demand signals
debt sustainability signals, refinancing risk, external vulnerability
labor/industry indicators, competitiveness, productivity
EU macro/industry/regional risk signals, inflation, labor, energy, water environment stats
rates, credit conditions, banking metrics, inflation expectations proxies
cross-border banking exposure, debt securities, credit cycles

provider: Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis
typical_use: macro factors, rates/spreads, recession proxies for risk models
demographics, trade, SDG, country context features
export/import shocks, supplier concentration, sanctions pass-through, sector exposure
tariff/trade flows context, dispute/supply stress proxies
trade/investment/transport indicators, supply-chain risk context
logistics disruption signals impacting company revenues/costs

dataset: World Bank Commodity Price Data (The Pink Sheet)
typical_use: input cost risk, inflation pass-through, commodity exposure stress tests
energy price shocks, refinery/utilization, supply tightness signals
fundamentals, cashflow risk, covenant signals, NLP on filings
notes: Free; rate limits and fair access rules apply.

typical_use: corporate registry risk, directors/PSC changes, insolvency signals
beneficial ownership mapping, counterparty risk, network analytics

typical_use: sanctions screening, counterparty risk, compliance gating
sanctions screening, entity resolution training data

dataset: UK Consolidated List of Financial Sanctions Targets
typical_use: UK sanctions screening, compliance

dataset: UN Security Council Consolidated Sanctions List
typical_use: UN sanctions screening, compliance baseline
EU sanctions screening

typical_use: event risk signals, sentiment, protest/strike detection affecting assets
physical security risk, disruption probability, location risk scoring
conflict intensity baselines, fatalities risk features for country/city models
sovereign/operating environment risk, corruption/regulatory quality factors
corruption risk factor, compliance heatmaps

dataset: WJP Rule of Law Index - current & historical data
typical_use: legal predictability factor, contract enforcement risk
climate transition/physical risk overlay at country level
heat/drought/flood risk features, scenario stress tests for operations

dataset: NOAA Climate Data Online (CDO) Web Services
typical_use: weather anomaly features, precipitation/temperature extremes
disaster frequency/severity baselines for country/sector risk
notes: Free for non-commercial after registration; paid commercial license.

typical_use: sudden-onset disaster alerting for supply chain/asset monitoring
notes: Feeds exist; official API details vary.

dataset: Copernicus EMS data access (flood/drought/wildfire early warning, mapping)
typical_use: early warning overlays for operations and infrastructure risk
wildfire exposure monitoring for sites/supply chains
notes: API key required for some endpoints.

typical_use: water stress/depletion/flood risk scoring for facilities and countries
notes: Free; see data dictionaries on GitHub.

typical_use: indicator definitions, reproducible risk features, data dictionaries
renewable water resources, withdrawals, irrigation exposure, country water balance context
notes: Free. Dissemination system via FAO platform.

typical_use: river flow/drought signals, operational water risk for US assets
standardized access for water monitoring + GIS workflows
notes: Free; some endpoints may require API keys.

dataset: NASA GRACE/GRACE-FO mascon products (water storage anomalies)
typical_use: groundwater/storage trends, basin stress early signals

dataset: NASA Earthdata catalog - GRACE mascon grids
typical_use: programmatic discovery + metadata for pipelines
notes: Free with Earthdata login for some downloads.

typical_use: asset geocoding, proximity to waterways/risks, infrastructure context
lighter OSM ingestion for pipelines
standardizing ingestion across IMF/OECD/ECB/BIS/Eurostat

dataset: Water Footprint Network - resources, tools, standards & calculators
typical_use: water footprint methods, calculators, publications for corporate/product water risk assessment
notes: Website + resources hub; data/tools availability varies by page.

dataset: GEMStat - The Global Freshwater Quality Database (GEMS/Water Data Centre)
typical_use: water quality baselines/trends; location-level quality risk features (pollution, compliance risk)
notes: Operational part of UNEP GEMS/Water; data portal available.

dataset: UN Environment Programme (UNEP) - programmes & data portals entry point
typical_use: policy/regulatory context, environment programmes, links to datasets (incl. GEMS/Water)
notes: French landing page; switch language for English resources.

dataset: UNEP-WCMC (World Conservation Monitoring Centre) - biodiversity & nature datasets/insights
typical_use: nature/biodiversity risk overlays (protected areas, ecosystems) relevant for permitting and supply chain constraints
notes: Acts as gateway to multiple biodiversity data products and partnerships.

dataset: FAO main portal (entry point to FAO data incl. AQUASTAT, FAOSTAT)
typical_use: agri-food + water/land context for country/sector exposure models
interactive screening and documentation for water stress/flood/drought indicators
notes: Portal; downloadable datasets are linked from WRI Aqueduct data pages.

dataset: WULCA AWARE (water scarcity footprint method) - overview
typical_use: water scarcity impact factors for LCA; proxy for location-based water scarcity risk
notes: Method reference; impact factors often distributed via publications/repos.

dataset: Zenodo record 15133241 - AWARE 2.0 water scarcity impact assessment (dataset/files)
typical_use: downloadable AWARE 2.0 factors and supporting files for quantitative water scarcity scoring
notes: Record may have newer versions; also accessible via DOI: https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.15133241

dataset: CDP (environmental disclosure platform: climate, water security, forests)
typical_use: company-reported water security disclosures; ESG risk signals and peer benchmarking
notes: Access to granular responses may require permissions/subscription; public scores exist.

dataset: GEMS/Water overview resource page (CEO Water Mandate) - 2019
typical_use: context + references for GEMS/Water data usage in corporate water risk programs
notes: Points to GEMS/Water programme and related tools.

typical_use: programme context, governance, access pathways for freshwater quality data
notes: UNEP page describing GEMS/Water mandate and evolution.

typical_use: background methodology/definitions for water quality risk discussions
